channel.title: AHSN 2021 Conference Website
channel.description: Recent content on AHSN 2021 Conference Website

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the homepage for the conference. This is a placeholder page.

item.title: Keynote Speakers
item.description: International/Online: Dr Christelle Pare (Research & Development, Just for Laughs/Juste pour Rire) New Zealand: Dr Barbara Plester (Senior Lecturer of Management, University of Auckland)

item.title: Program
item.description: Program will be posted here closer to the conference.

item.title: Registration
item.description: Registration for the 2021 AHSN Conference is now live at: Registration Website The registration options are as follows: Type Cost (NZD) Online Presenter (Waged/Faculty) $50 Online Presenter (Unwaged/student/under-employed) $30 Earlybird In-person Attendee (Waged/Faculty) $300 Earlybird In-person Attendee (Unwaged/student/under-employed) $220 In-person Attendee (Waged/Faculty) $350 In-person Attendee (Unwaged/student/under-employed) $250 The cut-off for Early Bird registration is January 15 2021.

item.title: Venue and Travel
item.description: The conference is being held at the Wellington Campus of Massey University. The Wellington Campus is located on a small hill at the South end of Wellington’s central Te Aro suburb. The main entrance to the campus is off Wallace Street (confusingly, Wallace Street is a continuation of Taranaki Street). It can also be accessed off Tasman Street or through the Pukeahu National War Memorial Park. GETTING TO CAMPUS For those conference delegates staying in downtown Wellington, especially in one of the nominated conference hotels, the campus is best reached on foot.

item.title: Abstract Submission
item.description: Abstract submission is now closed Registeration is now open! All proposals will be blind reviewed by members of the AHSN Review Panel. If you are interested in presenting at the conference, please submit a 250 word abstract with your name, e-mail address, and affiliation through the AHSN website submission portal at https://ahsn.org.au/abstracts/. Any other enquires regarding the event should also be addressed to 2021AHSN@gmail.com. New Dates, New Model, Student Scholarships – important updates!

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you have any questions about the conference please contact the organising committee at 2021AHSN@gmail.com. Conference Organisers Massey University: Nicholas Holm, Bryce Galloway Victoria University of Wellington: Meredith Marra, Stephen Skalicky
